pullrequest.title: Issue#100 wind plugin moved to world plugin

content.raw:
example world xacro:

```
<?xml version="1.0" ?>
<sdf version="1.6" xmlns:xacro="http://ros.org/wiki/xacro">
  <world name="wind_test">
    <xacro:include filename="$(find vrx_gazebo)/worlds/sandisland.xacro" />
    <xacro:sandisland />
    <include>
      <uri>model://robotx_light_buoy</uri>
      <pose>58 68 2 0 0 0.4</pose>
    </include>
    <xacro:include filename="$(find vrx_gazebo)/worlds/xacros/gazebo_wind_plugin.xacro"/>
    <xacro:usv_wind_gazebo direction="270"
                          mean_vel="10"
                          var_gain="100"
                          var_time="5" >
      <wind_objs>
        <wind_obj>
          <name>wamv</name>
          <link_name>base_link</link_name>
          <coeff_vector>0.5 0.5 0.33</coeff_vector>
        </wind_obj>
        <wind_obj>
          <name>robotx_light_buoy</name>
          <link_name>base_link</link_name>
          <coeff_vector>0.5 0.5 0.33</coeff_vector>
        </wind_obj>
      </wind_objs>
    </xacro:usv_wind_gazebo>
  </world>
</sdf>
```
